mapper.sql: ROUTEID, ROUTECODE, ROUTENAME, REMARKS, ROUTETYPE, DEPTID, AREATYPE, DELSTATUS, GISAREA, VEHICLEID, DRIVERID, CASHIERID, WAREHOUSE, CALCID
mapper.select:
select a.*,b.vehicleno,c.deptname,d.username as drivername,e.username as cashiername,f.username as calcname,g.name as gisareaname, h.contentlist as warehousename,decode(a.routetype,'1','干线','非干线')as routetypename,decode(a.areatype,'1','城网','农网')as areatypename,decode(a.delstatus,'10','启用','停用')as delstatusname from t_sys_routeinfo a left outer join t_sys_vehicle b on a.vehicleid=b.id left outer join t_sys_dept c on a.deptid=c.id left outer join t_sys_user d on a.driverid=d.id left outer join t_sys_user e on a.cashierid=e.id left outer join t_sys_user f on a.calcid=f.id left outer join t_gis_region g on a.gisarea=g.id left outer join t_sys_basetypeinfo h on a.warehouse=h.id where 1=1
and (routecode like'%'||#{param.routecode}||'%' or vehicleno like'%'||#{param.routecode}||'%' or DEPTNAME like'%'||#{param.routecode}||'%' or d.username like'%'||#{param.routecode}||'%' or e.username like'%'||#{param.routecode}||'%' or f.username like'%'||#{param.routecode}||'%')
and a.delstatus= #{param.delstatus}
and a.delstatus= '10'
order by a.routecode
select distinct t.deptid,d.deptname from T_SYS_ROUTEINFO t,t_sys_dept d where t.deptid=d.id
select distinct calcid,u.username as calcname from T_SYS_ROUTEINFO r,t_sys_user u where r.calcid=u.id

select a.*,b.vehicleno,c.deptname,d.username as drivername,e.username as cashiername,f.username as calcname,g.name as gisareaname, h.contentlist as warehousename,decode(a.routetype,'1','干线','非干线')as routetypename,decode(a.areatype,'1','城网','农网')as areatypename,decode(a.delstatus,'10','启用','停用')as delstatusname from t_sys_routeinfo a left outer join t_sys_vehicle b on a.vehicleid=b.id left outer join t_sys_dept c on a.deptid=c.id left outer join t_sys_user d on a.driverid=d.id left outer join t_sys_user e on a.cashierid=e.id left outer join t_sys_user f on a.calcid=f.id left outer join t_gis_region g on a.gisarea=g.id left outer join t_sys_basetypeinfo h on a.warehouse=h.id where 1=1 and a.routecode= #{routecode}
mapper.insert: insert into T_SYS_ROUTEINFO (ROUTEID, ROUTECODE, ROUTENAME, REMARKS, ROUTETYPE, DEPTID, AREATYPE, DELSTATUS, GISAREA, VEHICLEID, DRIVERID, CASHIERID, WAREHOUSE, CALCID) values (#{routeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{routecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areatype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{delstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gisarea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vehicleid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{driverid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cashierid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{warehouse,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{calcid,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into T_SYS_ROUTEINFO
ROUTEID,
ROUTECODE,
ROUTENAME,
REMARKS,
ROUTETYPE,
DEPTID,
AREATYPE,
DELSTATUS,
GISAREA,
VEHICLEID,
DRIVERID,
CASHIERID,
WAREHOUSE,
CALCID,
S_SYS_ROUTEINFO.nextval,
#{routecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{routename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{routetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{areatype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{delstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{gisarea,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{vehicleid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{driverid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{cashierid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{warehouse,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{calcid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update T_SYS_ROUTEINFO
ROUTECODE = #{routecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROUTENAME = #{routename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROUTETYPE = #{routetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPTID = #{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREATYPE = #{areatype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DELSTATUS = #{delstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GISAREA = #{gisarea,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VEHICLEID = #{vehicleid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DRIVERID = #{driverid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CASHIERID = #{cashierid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WAREHOUSE = #{warehouse,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CALCID = #{calcid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ROUTEID = #{routeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_SYS_ROUTEINFO set ROUTECODE = #{routecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROUTENAME = #{routename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROUTETYPE = #{routetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPTID = #{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREATYPE = #{areatype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELSTATUS = #{delstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GISAREA = #{gisarea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VEHICLEID = #{vehicleid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DRIVERID = #{driverid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CASHIERID = #{cashierid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WAREHOUSE = #{warehouse,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CALCID = #{calcid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ROUTEID = #{routeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
